document_data.name: Varorn Irrymgalis
document_data.mainbody: '''Varorn Irrymgalis''' was an [[elf]] steward in [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Activities: Varorn was the Steward of the Southern Gate of the city.
document_data.History: In [[1487 DR]], [[Storm Silverhand]], [[Arclath Delcastle]], and [[Amarune Whitewave]] were conducted in front of Varorn in order to decide if they could enter in the city. Storm tried to argue with him. In the end, it was [[Fflar Starbrow Melruth]] himself who decided to admit them.
document_data.Relationship: Varorn was the son of [[Orblyn Irrymgalis]].
